CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new products tailored to your interests and needs. Our app makes finding your next must-have item effortless and fun.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to recommend new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply create a profile, indicate your preferences, and start exploring a world of innovative items.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are the products on the app available for purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, most products featured on our app are available for purchase. We provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can buy the items that catch your eye.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items on the market. Our team of curators works tirelessly to bring you fresh and exciting discoveries.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I share product finds with friends?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Our app includes social sharing features that allow you to easily share your favorite product discoveries with friends and family via social media or direct messaging.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
HERO_SUBTITLE: Uncover exciting new products and stay ahead of the curve
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the product discovery app work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to recommend new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply create a profile, browse categories, and start discovering!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, the basic version of our app is completely free. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for enhanced product discovery.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't handle transactions directly, our app provides links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the products you discover. We aim to make the process as seamless as possible.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items across various categories.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share product discoveries with friends?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app includes social sharing features, allowing you to easily share your favorite product finds with friends and family through various platforms.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find the Best New Items on the Market
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Experience tailored product suggestions based on your interests, browsing history, and preferences.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with in-depth product reviews and ratings from industry experts and fellow users.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals by comparing prices across multiple retailers and online marketplaces.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Set up notifications for new releases, price drops, and restocks on products you're interested in.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share discoveries with friends, create wishlists, and see what products are popular within your social network.

LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Uncover Hidden Gems and Trending Innovations
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Your personal gateway to a world of exciting new products. Stay ahead of the curve and find items you'll love before they go mainstream.
